topics.body:
Wow I feel as if I got hit by a Plane all of a sudden.

I woke up fine and got up to go say have a nice day to my mom before she went to work, and right after that all of s sudden I feel terrible and every time I move around I feel like the room is spinning.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body: HEHA
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000
